text: Club Deportivo Loeches is a football club based in Loeches in the Community of Madrid. Founded in 1968, it plays in the Primera Categoría Aficionados. Its stadium is Cruz de Piedra with a capacity of 1,500 seats, in Loeches. == Season to season== {| |valign="top" width=0%| {| class="wikitable" |- style="background:#f0f6fa;" !Season !Tier !Division
